score_someip_gateway_gatewayd_config_Roo.description: Contains lists of all local and remote service instances required by the application.

local_service_instances.description: Defines all service instances that are hosted on the same machine.

remote_service_instances.description: Defines all external service instances that this application will communicate with.

score_someip_gateway_gatewayd_config_Ser.description: Uniquely identifies and describes a specific SOME/IP service, including its version and location.

someip_service_id.description: The 16-bit identifier for the service as defined in the SOME/IP specification.

someip_service_version_major.description: Indicates breaking changes in the service API. Consumers and providers must match this version.

someip_service_version_minor.description: Indicates non-breaking changes. A provider may have a higher version than a consumer.

instance_specifier.description: A unique string used to differentiate between multiple instances of the same service.

events.description: Defines all events associated with this service instance.

score_someip_gateway_gatewayd_config_Eve.description: Describes a single event within a service.

someip_method_id.description: The identifier for the event within the service, corresponding to the Method ID in the SOME/IP specification.

event_name.description: A unique, human-readable name for the event (e.g., 'VehicleSpeedChanged').
